title: Is the pixel 4 repair support theives?
content:
- I sent my pixel 4 in for repair on June 2nd.   
- It arrived June 6th.  
- ~7 days later I consulted live chat on the status.  They said it was received and being repaired.  
- ~7 days later I consulted again, same response, to wait.   
- ~7 days later I contacted again, was told its being escalated and to wait 3-5 days.
- ~7 days later,  I tell them I've waited for response and received no response via email.  
I was told all I can do is wait.   

Your process says 7-10 business days.   
Today is July 8th, more than a month later.   

So let me ask,  is Google a bunch of thieves?   

I've tried communicating over and over and over AND OVER!! that I need my phone or a refund.   
I'm told to wait.   Do you want me to wait forever?
